title: Service Quality Practical Competency Enhancement: Role-Play Workshop for Requirements Engineering Skill Development

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze root causes of stakeholder requirement conflicts through role-play simulations.
Learners can systematically organize background, rationale, and objectives when documenting requirements.
Learners can design requirement verification strategies based on real project cases and improve them through peer evaluation.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
